sampleInterval.title: Sampling Interval (ms)
sampleInterval.description: The interval at which to record data points.

automaticRecording.title: Always recording in background
automaticRecording.description: Toggle to enable or disable constant recording of polar data.

automaticRecordingFile.title: File name for automatic recording polar
automaticRecordingFile.description: The interval at which to record data points.

minLenghtValidData.title: Minimum time on course (seconds)
minLenghtValidData.description: The minimum time in the same course to consider the values are valid to record.

sameCourseAngleOffset.title: Accepted course variation to consider stable course (degrees)

useVmgThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by STW to VMG ratio
useVmgThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on STW to VMG ratio to detect sudden speed changes.

vmgRatioThresholdUp.title: Upper threshold for STW to VMG ratio

vmgRatioThresholdDown.title: Lower threshold for STW to VMG ratio

useAvgSpeedThreshold.title: Filter the recorded points by deviations from average speed
useAvgSpeedThreshold.description: Toggle to enable or disable the point filtering based on the average speed in the specified time window to detect sudden speed changes.

avgSpeedTimeWindow.title: Time windows (s)
avgSpeedTimeWindow.description: Time windows (in seconds) to calculate the average speed

avgSpeedThresholdDown.title: Lower threshold for average speed window
